# Setup

```{r auth, warning=FALSE}
library(googleAuthR)
library(googleCloudVertexAIR)

options(googleAuthR.scopes.selected = "https://www.googleapis.com/auth/cloud-platform")

gar_auth_service(json_file = Sys.getenv("GAR_SERVICE_JSON"))
```

# Set global arguements

```{r gcva-global-arguements}
projectId <- Sys.getenv("GCVA_DEFAULT_PROJECT_ID")
gcva_region_set("us-central1")
gcva_project_set(projectId)
```

# List datasets

```{r}
gcva_list_datasets()
```

# Create a dataset

```{r}
# First, let's set a unique dataset name with a timestamp to avoid confusion:
# displayName <- paste0("my-experiment-", strftime(Sys.time(), "%Y%m%d%H%M%S"))
displayName <- "my-experiment-01"
displayName
```


```{r}
gcva_create_tabluar_dataset(displayName = displayName,
                            gcsSource = "gs://gcatr-dev/bank_marketing.csv")
```

# List datasets (again)

```{r}
gcva_list_datasets()
```

# Delete dataset

```{r}
gcva_delete_dataset(displayName = displayName)
```

# List datasets

```{r}
gcva_list_datasets()
```
